mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OrderList VALUES(#{orderSheet.orderId}, #{mId}, #{orderSheet.oZipcode}, #{orderSheet.oAddress1}, #{orderSheet.oDate}, #{orderSheet.oReceiver}, #{orderSheet.oTel}, null, null,1, #{orderSheet.oPayment}, #{orderSheet.oAddress2}, #{orderSheet.oName}, #{orderSheet.oTotalPrice} )
